name: Super Robot City War
description:
Alien robot shooting has begun from outer space & has taken over modern hi tech laboratory in new FPS robot shooting war game. You have to be futuristic real robot fps shooting hero and eliminate evil war robots from other planet who are planning to take over the lab in this modern robot war. It’s a highly secret mission in which robot hero fight the futuristic robot shooter army and survive the shootings & attacks from enemies. Use best tactics and strategies to save yourself from modern robot shoot survival war. New super robot shoot game is all about survival. Let’s go and destroy futuristic enemies in this robot escape by shooting them with your modern weapon in new future robot survival war fps shooting game.

Features
• Challenging Robot Shooting missions
• Modern sci-fi environment
• HD graphics and amazing sounds
• Smooth controls and gameplay
• Shoot the robots with your hero to move into next level
• Futuristic robot war with modern weapons
